name: preschool-erp
description: Pre-School ERP System with Frontend and Backend

scripts.install:all: bun install && cd frontend && bun install && cd ../backend && bun install
scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:frontend && bun run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && bun run typecheck && cd ../backend && tsc --noEmit
